attributes.action: stop pub companies over charging your local pub for alcohol
attributes.additional_details:
The government needs to push through the Statutory code for Pub Companies to stop all the big companies inflating alcohol to their tenants by over 40% compared to Free of Tie pubs.
If this bill is not passed soon more pubs will go out of business and more people will be out of work and potentially homeless.
All landlords should be able to buy from who they want to and enable proper competition in the market place.
